detail_desc: All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Pin-tucks at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in patterned mesh with short, double-frilled sleeves and a double frill at the hem. Lined with a jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia motif, padded antlers on top and a nose at the front.
5-pocket, jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a slightly lower crotch, button fly and straight, wide legs with a concealed zip at the hems.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at one hip, reflective details, and legs with ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
